content: i think these look so cute - and i hope you do too instructions are for 3 preemie sizes - small medium and large - and now newborn too requires ~ dk yarn 4mm needles 8 small buttons 4 for fastening and 4 for decoration only a classic look - knitted in a modern way top-down such a lovely gender-neutral design **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
